name: Sesame Communications
description:
Sesame Communications helps dental and orthodontic practices harness the power of the Internet to accelerate new patient acquisition and transform the patient experience. The company supports thousands of practices in their efforts to grow and thrive in the digital age. The Sesame 24 to 7 platform provides an end-to-end, HIPAA-compliant system tailored to the unique and specific needs of dentistry.
Sesame is recognized as one of the fastest growing technology companies in the United States.Â
